ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kurn's Tower was  LAMENT and undead?
ygData.msgSnippet: Lots of quest loot, lots of bones. Money. We didn t find anything oh-aw spiffy. OTOH, all three of those of us in there were item-twinked. There was one
ygData.messageBody:
Lots of quest loot, lots of bones. Money.
We didn't find anything oh-aw spiffy.

OTOH, all three of those of us in there were item-twinked.
There was one magical item (BUrnyai Hide Sleeves) we got
off a greenie skeleton. Our monk could wear it, but
decided not to. i believe Druids could wear it too, so
bards probably could.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
>Sent: Friday, May 26, 2000 8:10 AM

>Anyone know if there is any interesting loot in Kurn's tower? I was
>thinking it might be a good place to look for Burynai Bundt Cake.
>Also some
>of my guilds lower level member were thinking of trying it.
>
> Kit
